features.featureTitle: Save the uploaded car photo (rear of a slammed orange Honda Civic) as a static asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/ebay-banner.dim_940x313.jpg. This image will be used as the base for the eBay affiliate banner after the RevGrid logo is incorporated into it.

In frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx, replace the existing text-based eBay affiliate banner with an image-based banner that displays the generated eBay banner image (frontend/public/assets/generated/ebay-banner.dim_940x313.jpg). The banner must be wrapped in an anchor tag linking to https://ebay.com/inf/revreel?mkcid=1&mkrid=711-53200-19255-0&siteid=0&campid=5339143418&toolid=80008&mkevt=1 with target='_blank' and rel='noopener noreferrer'. Display all three sponsor banners (eBay, BullBoost, Enjuku Racing) side-by-side in a single horizontal row, each as a clickable image banner. Style the row consistently with the app's dark automotive theme (dark/asphalt background, equal-width or proportional columns, slim clickable strip). The banners must remain in their existing placement position (between the TopBar and main content area or above the BottomNav).
